API Knowledge:
javax.xml.datatype.XMLGregorianCalendar can be converted to the following data types:
1) java.util.Date; 2) java.util.GregorianCalendar; 3) long (milliseconds); 4) String (ISO 8601 format)
java.util.GregorianCalendar can be converted to the following data types:
1) java.util.Date; 2) long (milliseconds); 3) java.util.TimeZone; 4) java.util.Locale
Q: Based on the knowledge above, can the data types of javax.xml.datatype.XMLGregorianCalendar and java.util.GregorianCalendar be converted to each other?

API Knowledge
javax.sql.rowset.CachedRowSet.setCommand() is used to set a command string for a row set. This could include SQL queries for retrieving data from a database.
javax.sql.RowSet is an interface that provides methods to manipulate general row set attributes. It does not directly relate to setting SQL command strings but provides a base for operations on row sets.
Q: Based on the knowledge above, can the functionalities of javax.sql.rowset.CachedRowSet.setCommand() and javax.sql.RowSet be directly converted to each other?

API Knowledge:
java.sql.ResultSet can be converted to the following data types:
1) javax.sql.rowset.JdbcRowSet; 2) CachedRowSet; 3) WebRowSet; 4) FilteredRowSet; 5) JoinRowSet
javax.sql.rowset.JdbcRowSet is a wrapper around a ResultSet that makes it possible to use the result set as a JavaBeans component.
Q: Based on the above knowledge, can the data types of java.sql.ResultSet and javax.sql.rowset.JdbcRowSet be converted to each other?

API Knowledge:
javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest.getParameter() is used to retrieve a single String parameter from the request.
javax.sql.rowset.serial.SerialBlob is used to hold an array of bytes representing a Blob (Binary Large Object) in SQL.
Q: Based on the knowledge above, can the data types of javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest.getParameter() and javax.sql.rowset.serial.SerialBlob be converted to each other?
